In addition , safety random spot urine analyzed calcium creatinine day 30 . Muscle performance measure measure muscle biopsy perform begin end study .

Subjects must agree change usual level physical activity change amount calcium vitamin D supplement use duration study . If take calcium supplement , must agree take supplement time lunch . General : 1 . Total calcium intake > 1000mg daily prescreening questionnaire . 2 . More 400 IU daily supplemental vitamin D prescreening questionnaire . 3 . A screen 25 ( OH ) D level > 60 nmol/ L. 4 . Screening 24hour urine calcium > 275 mg. 5 . An abnormal serum calcium . 6 . Travel latitude < 35 degree N within 2 month time enrollment ; plan travel latitude < 35 degree N 4month study , likelihood tanning ( e.g . appreciable sun exposure without sun screen ) . 7 . Greater 2 drink alcohol day . Medications : 1 . Bone active drug bisphosphonates , estrogen , calcitonin , teriparatide 2 . Diuretics 3 . Oral glucocorticoid last month 4 . Phosphates last week 5 . Lithium 6 . Cod liver oil 7 . Total parenteral nutrition 8 . Calcium contain antacid 9 . Coumadin prescribe anticoagulant Diseases : 1 . Active thyroid disease unstable levothyroxine dose 2 . Parathyroid disease 3 . Sarcoidosis 4 . Fracture foot , leg , hip last year 5 . Renal stone < 5 year 6 . Alkaline phosphatase > 10 % upper limit normal 7 . Pancreatitis 8 . Active malignancy ( basal cell cancer skin ) cancer therapy last year 9 . Uncontrolled arrhythmia last year 10 . Malabsorption 11 . Use walker wheelchair ( 3post cane okay ) 12 .
